game

Class HorsesGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Game
      • game.HorsesGame

  • public class HorsesGame
extends Game
    The HorsesGame class represents the implementation of the Horses game.
    Author:
    edouard

      • getNextStairway

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • moveForward

        public void moveForward(Piece piece,
                        int nbDeplacement)
                 throws PathBlockedException
        Moves a Pieceforward. If the piece is in a HorsePen move the Piece using moveFromHorsePen.
        Parameters:
        piece - The piece that is to be moved.
        nbDeplacement - The number of squares left to go.
        Throws:
        PathBlockedException - If the piece is blocked by another piece.
        See Also:
        Piece, Square

      • moveFromHorsePen

        public void moveFromHorsePen(Piece piece,
                             Square pieceSquare,
                             Square startSquare)
                      throws PathBlockedException
        Moves a Piece from its HorsePen. If a enemy Piece is on the startSquare it kills it. If one of your Team's Piece is on the startSquare it throws a PathBlockedException.
        Parameters:
        piece - The piece to move.
        pieceSquare - The square the piece to be moved is in.
        startSquare - The square after the horse pen.
        Throws:
        PathBlockedException - If there is already a piece on the next square.
        See Also:
        Square, Piece

      • moveBackward

        public void moveBackward(Piece piece,
                         int nbDeplacement)
                  throws PathBlockedException
        Moves a piece backwards. Throws a PathBlockedException if a square is blocked by another piece.
        Parameters:
        piece - The piece to move.
        nbDeplacement - The number of squares left.
        Throws:
        PathBlockedException - If a square is occupied by another piece
        See Also:
        Square, Piece

      • moveToStairway

        public void moveToStairway(Piece piece,
                           int nbDeplacement)
                    throws PathBlockedException
        Moves the Piece to the StairwaySquare. Checks if the movement is authorized.
        Parameters:
        piece - The piece to move.
        nbDeplacement - The result of movement.
        Throws:
        PathBlockedException
        See Also:
        Piece

      • killPiece

        public void killPiece(Piece killer,
                      Piece killed)
        Kills a Piece. The killer Piece takes it place and the killed Piece goes back to its startingSquare.
        Parameters:
        killer - The piece that kills the other.
        killed - The piece that is killed.
        See Also:
        Piece

      • createPieces

        public Horse createPieces(int x,
                          int y,
                          boolean alive,
                          Team team)
        Creates the pieces.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-axis position of the piece.
        y - The y-axis position of the piece.
        alive - A boolean to say if the piece is alive or not
        team - The team of the piece created
        Returns:
        The newly created piece

      • isPiecesStairway

        public boolean isPiecesStairway(Piece piece)
        Checks if a piece is on a square of its team.
        Parameters:
        piece - The piece for which you want to know if it's on a square of its team
        Returns:
        true if the piece is on a square of its team, false otherwise.
